name: Luxury Simulator
summary: Luxury Simulator is a first person game-essay set in the last bastion of human civilisation, a labyrinthine bunker-palace after time. The viewer as opposed to the traditional narratives of video games, is not a hero - but an individual passing through, another guest in the final elite home of human civilisation. The memory of the fortress's building echoes throughout it's chambers, a lone voice from an era now lost.
